title: Practise Tool
body:
I was just wondering where I could find a full list of the features in practice mode, because right now all I can find is the following:

* Unlimited Gold
* Instant Cooldown Resets
* Level Locking
* Minion Freezing
* And somewhere I saw a Rioter confirm that you would be able to respawn jungle camps.

I was also wondering if it would be possible to somehow get a leash, because if I'm practicing my jungle I'm going to want a leash to make it seem more like actually jungling. Perhaps you could spawn in a support and adc bot, then get them to attack the camp then despawn them just before the camp dies. I don't know, I'm just throwing out ideas. I know you could just skip the first camp, give yourself some gold and set your level to level 2, but still...
